App.LoadingProblemText: Unable to fully load the app. Try to reload, or if problem continues, please remove and reinstall the app. Removing the app will delete your wallet, DO NOT REMOVE unless you have backup.

Settings.DisplayLanguageHint: Change the display language for the app.
Settings.ChooseModeHint: You must save the settings for mode and accent color to be persisted.
Settings.AmountFormatHint: Change the display format for amounts.
Settings.AutoLockTimerHint: Set the idle time in minutes before the wallet becomes locked.
Settings.CustomServerHint: The custom server must contain a variable (id) which is the network for each account you make.
Settings.WalletDescriptionP1: Non-Custodial HD wallet in your browser for Coins, Tokens, Identities, NFTs and more.
Settings.WalletDescriptionP2: This wallet is a free and open source software.
Settings.AnarchyText: “Unlike the communities traditionally associated with the word 'anarchy', in a crypto-anarchy the government is not temporarily destroyed but permanently forbidden and permanently unnecessary. It's a community where the threat of violence is impotent because violence is impossible, and violence is impossible because its participants cannot be linked to their true names or physical locations.” - Wei Dai 1998
Settings.LogsDescription: Debug and error logs from the app that you can share with the developers.
Settings.RegisterProtocolHandlerDescription: You can register this extension as handler for different protocols. This action must be done in full window mode, it is not possible to do in extension popup view. Click the expander icon at the bottom right, then open "Settings" and "Register Protocol Handler" again.
Settings.RegisterProtocolHandlerDescriptionP1: If you click X on the request or block the request, the request will never be displayed again until you manually unblock the extension.
Settings.RegisterProtocolHandlerDescriptionP2: Copy the link manually and open in a new tab.
Settings.ThirdPartyLicensesDescription: CoinVault is an open source project published under the MIT license. You can view the source code on
Settings.NetworkStatusDescription: Lists indexers used by accounts in your wallet.
Settings.NoServerOnline: No servers online for this network.
Settings.ChangePasswordDescription: Change the password you use to unlock your wallet.
Settings.PermissionsDescription: Manage persisted permissions you have authorized web apps.
Settings.ShowSecretRecoveryPhraseDescription: Do NOT share you secret phrase with anyone!
Settings.ShowSecretRecoveryPhraseDescriptionP1: If someone has your secret recovery phrase, they have full control over your wallet.

Wallet.CreateWalletDescription: This is your private and secret sentence that is your account. You must store it safely, if you lose it, you will lose all your assets. Nobody can recover it for you.
Wallet.RecoverWalletDescription: Restore your existing wallet with your 12 or 24-word secret recovery phrase.
Wallet.RecoverWalletNote: Note: This is a hot wallet it is advice to don't recover important wallets on hot wallets.
Wallet.YourPersonalExtensionWords: Your personal extension words, this is optional.
Wallet.PersonalExtensionWordsTooltip: If you want to increase the security of your wallet, you can enter your personal extension words. This adds a two-factor security to your wallet, meaning that you will need both the recovery phrase of 12 words, which you have written down for backup, and the extension word you enter below. Make sure you can easily remember these extension words. If you lose it, then you will not be able to restore your wallet, even if you have a backup of the recovery phrase. Do not overestimate your ability to remember this word.
Wallet.CreatePasswordDescription: You use this to unlock your wallet and keep your wallet secure. Use a strong password.
Wallet.CreatePasswordMessage: Nobody can recover your password if you forget it.
Wallet.InstallAppNotIOS: By installing the app, you'll get a dedicated icon to launch and dedicated window on your device.
Wallet.InstallAppIOS: On Apple devices, you must use the 'Share' button and choose the 'Add to Home Screen' action.
Wallet.AllDoneDescription: You can now begin to manage your wallet.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP1: Your Secret Recovery Phrase controls all of your accounts.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP2: Never share your Secret Recovery Phrase with anyone.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP3L1: We will never ask for your Secret Recovery Phrase.
Wallet.ProtectYourWalletP3L2: Always keep your Secret Recovery Phrase in a secure and secret place.
Wallet.Disclaimer: The software is provided 'as is', without warranty of any kind. Use at your own discretion.
Wallet.DeleteYourWalletMessage: This will remove the '{{ name }}' wallet. Make sure you have a backup of your secret recovery phrase or you might lose your wallet forever. Nobody can restore it except you.

Wipe.WipeAllDataAndCacheDescription: This will remove all data, state and cache from the extension. All local changes that has not been persisted to cloud storage or blockchain, will be lost.

AddressBook.AddressBookHint: Contacts are stored locally on your device. They are not synced with any servers. If you reset your wallet on this device or another device, your contacts will not be restored.
AddressBook.Name: Name

Account.Name: Name
Account.ThisIdentityIsCurrentlyNOTPublic: This identity is currently NOT public
Account.ThisProfileIsCurrentlyNOTPublic: This profile is currently NOT public
Account.ProfileNameHint: The name you want to be identified with.
Account.ProfileEmailHint: The e-mail to contact the identity.
Account.ProfileWebsiteHint: Website that is connected to the identity.
Account.Label: Label
Account.ReceiveNote: Note: this is a hot wallet, we recommend using it for small amounts
Account.ReceiveAddressCaption: This address can only be used to receive {{ symbol }} on the {{ name }} network.
Account.AmountRequired: Amount is required and must be correctly entered.
Account.AmountTooManyDecimals: The value of amount cannot have more than 8 decimals.
Account.AmountTooHighValue: The value of amount must be below 100000000000.
Account.StandardTokensNotice: Notice: The token API does not support decimals in the current release. Values are shown without decimals in this version.
Account.WalletsPersistedStateMessage: Contains your encrypted secret recovery phrase. Do NOT share this with anyone!
Account.SelectAccountsMessage: Choose which accounts to add to your wallet
Account.ErrorWhileCreatingAccount: Error while creating account. Critical error, please try again.
Account.FeeInvalid: Fee is required and must be correctly entered.
Account.ClickToFillOutMaximum: Click to fill out maximum (minus fee)
Account.PaymentRequestIsMadeForAnotherNetwork: The payment request is made for another network:
Account.FeeRateTooLow: Fee rate too low, minimum required
Account.SwapCardMessage: Additional chain swap fee is taken from the amount entered, which is a fixed amountof '0.001'. If you want the receiver to get '1', enter amount '1.001'.

Action.SigningAccountMessage: You attest with your selected account to the following content
Action.SigningContent: The website is requesting you to generate an DID Document.
Action.AttestContentDescription: You attest with your selected account to the following content
Action.SuccessfullyLoggedIn: You have successfully logged in. You can now close this window
Action.BlockcoreVaultSetupDescription: You are performing a request for Blockcore Vault setup. This action involves you picking the decentralized identifier you want to be owner of the Blockcore Vault instance.

Manifest.Description: Non-Custodial wallet for Coins, Tokens, Identities, NFTs and more.

Exchange.PurchaseCryptoDescription: Purchase your first cryptocurrency using traditional payment methods such as Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay, SWIFT, SEPA, and more.
Exchange.ExchangeCryptoDescription: Exchange your existing cryptocurrency for other cryptocurrency.
Exchange.ExchangeBTCForSTRAX: Exchange BTC for STRAX with Exolix
Exchange.ExchangeSTRAXForBTC: Exchange STRAX for BTC with Exolix
Exchange.PartnersDescription: Using our links and affiliated partners, helps support the continued development of this wallet.

SignVerify.SignatureVerifiedDescription: This means that the message has been verified to be signed by the owner of the address/identity specified.
SignVerify.FailedSignatureVerificationDescription: This means that the message was not signed by the owner of the address/identity specified.
